trans-unit.source: Fortune's Favor
trans-unit.target: Fortune's Favor

trans-unit.source: Target opponent looks at the top four cards of your library and separates them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Target opponent looks at the top four cards of your library and separates them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

trans-unit.source: Uncertainty has its own allure.
trans-unit.target: Uncertainty has its own allure.

trans-unit.source: Incendiary Flow
trans-unit.target: Incendiary Flow

trans-unit.source: Incendiary Flow deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: Incendiary Flow deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

trans-unit.source: "What's your plan?" Gideon asked. "Are you serious?" Chandra replied.
trans-unit.target: "What's your plan?" Gideon asked. "Are you serious?" Chandra replied.

trans-unit.source: Reverse Engineer

trans-unit.source: The Hold, an illegal research facility in a derelict merchant ship, became a wellspring of renegade intelligence.

trans-unit.source: Fatal Push
trans-unit.target: Fatal Push

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature if it has mana value 2 or less. Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has mana value 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.
trans-unit.target: Destroy target creature if it has mana value 2 or less. Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has mana value 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

trans-unit.source: Renegade Rallier
trans-unit.target: Renegade Rallier

trans-unit.source: Revolt — When Renegade Rallier enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, return target permanent card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Revolt — When Renegade Rallier enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, return target permanent card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
